name: Hot Mushroom and Pepperoni Pizza Dip
description: If you love pizza, and you love dip, then you are going fall in love with this pizza dip! This makes ALOT of dip - it serves at least 8 to 12. I made it this big so it resembles a pizza in size.
recipeIngredient: 8 oz / 250g   cream cheese (, at room temperature)
1/2 cup sour cream ((light or full fat))
1 cup pizza sauce ((see notes for fast homemade pizza sauce recipe))
1/3 cup onion (, diced (brown, white, yellow or red))
1/2 cup tasty cheese (, grated (or any other melting cheese with flavour) (see notes))

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a non stick fry pan over high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a non stick fry pan over high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced pepperoni and fry for 1 minute until it starts to brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the diced pepperoni and fry for 1 minute until it starts to brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add the onions and sauté for 1 minute. Then add the mushrooms and cook for 30 seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add the onions and sauté for 1 minute. Then add the mushrooms and cook for 30 seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove onion mixture from the fry pan and place onto a plate with a paper towel (to drain the excess fat).
recipeInstructions.name: Remove onion mixture from the fry pan and place onto a plate with a paper towel (to drain the excess fat).

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the Base ingredients in a bowl and mix until smooth and combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the Base ingredients in a bowl and mix until smooth and combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the Base in a 20 cm / 8 inch base with a 24 cm / 9 inch rim pie dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread the Base in a 20 cm / 8 inch base with a 24 cm / 9 inch rim pie dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the pizza sauce over the Base, then sprinkle with the onion mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread the pizza sauce over the Base, then sprinkle with the onion mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle over the tasty cheese, then the mozzarella cheese.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle over the tasty cheese, then the mozzarella cheese.

recipeInstructions.text: Place sliced pepperoni over the cheese.
recipeInstructions.name: Place sliced pepperoni over the cheese.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the oven for 15 to 20 minutes, until golden brown and bubbling. Check it at 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in the oven for 15 to 20 minutes, until golden brown and bubbling. Check it at 15 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Spread french stick slices on 2 baking trays (or one very large one).
itemListElement.name: Spread french stick slices on 2 baking trays (or one very large one).

itemListElement.text: Bake for 5 to 8 minutes until crispy and lightly browned.
itemListElement.name: Bake for 5 to 8 minutes until crispy and lightly browned.

itemListElement.text: Remove from oven and rub each piece lightly with the cut side of the garlic.
itemListElement.name: Remove from oven and rub each piece lightly with the cut side of the garlic.

review.reviewBody: Ah! Dip in pizza form? I'm sold. Pinned for next time I have friends over!
Oh My goodness Nagi, you are seriously  tempting me today with this  awesome Mushroom Pepperoni Pizza Dip!  Just love love love it. Never made one but will with this recipe, I would be soon.
This is the ultimate dish for a pizza-lovin', cheese lover like me. Love it.
